item.title: 新闻集团季度业绩超出预期，得益于道琼斯和数字房地产服务部门的增长
item.description: 受道琼斯业务和在线房地产服务增长的推动，新闻集团周四公布的第三季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，股价在延时交易中上涨约 3%。【原文：News Corp beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, driven by growth in its Dow Jones business and online real estate services, sending its shares up about 3% in extended trading.】

item.title: Microchip 预测第一季度利润和收入高于预期
item.description: 芯片制造商微芯科技（Microchip Technology）继周四公布乐观的第四季度收入后，预计第一季度收入和利润将高于预期，这表明市场对其芯片的需求正在复苏。【原文：Chipmaker Microchip Technology forecast first-quarter revenue and profit above estimates following an upbeat fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, signaling a recovery in demand for its chips.】

item.title: 怪物饮料因需求不振，季度净销售额意外下滑
item.description: 怪物饮料公司（Monster Beverage）周四公布的第一季度收入意外下降，表明在经济不确定的情况下，美国消费者减少了对价格昂贵的能量饮料的消费。【原文：Monster Beverage reported a surprise fall in first-quarter revenue on Thursday, signaling consumers in the U.S. pared back spending on pricey energy drinks amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 澳大利亚麦格理全年利润增长近 5
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚麦格理公司（Macquarie）发布公告称，受资产管理部门业绩费用增加的推动，全年利润增长近 5%。【原文：Australia's Macquarie posted a nearly 5% rise in its full-year profit on Friday, driven by increased performance fees recorded by its asset management segment.】

item.title: 美国商务部长称下月将推出数十项贸易协议
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周四对 CNBC 表示，华盛顿将在未来一个月内推出数十项贸易协议，但对大多数国家征收的 10%关税可能会继续保留。【原文：Washington will roll out dozens of trade deals over the next month, but a 10% tariff imposed on most countries will likely stay, U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick told CNBC on Thursday】

item.title: Wolfspeed 2026 年收入低于预期，股价下滑
item.description: 周四，芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 预测 2026 年收入低于华尔街预期，并公布第三季度收入下降 7%，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 11%。【原文：Chipmaker Wolfspeed forecast 2026 revenue below Wall Street estimates and reported a 7% decline in third-quarter revenue on Thursday, sending its shares down 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: 生产成本上升，MP 材料公司转为季度亏损
item.description: 美国稀土生产商 MP Materials 公司周四表示，尽管业绩符合投资者预期，但部分由于生产成本上升和利息支出增加，该公司第一季度出现亏损。【原文：U.S. rare earths producer MP Materials said on Thursday that it swung to a first-quarter loss due in part to rising production costs and interest expenses, though results met investors' expectations.】

item.title: 尽管第一季度业绩不佳，Nutrien 仍看好化肥行业前景
item.description: 尽管周三晚间发布的第一季度业绩令人失望，但 Nutrien 在周四的分析师电话会议上对 2025 年全球化肥市场前景表示看好。【原文：Nutrien offered a bullish outlook for the 2025 global fertilizer market in an analyst call on Thursday, despite issuing disappointing first-quarter results on Wednesday night.】

item.title: 交易日 关税紧张局势降温，市场热闹非凡
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司第一季度亏损扩大，原因是乘客放弃美国旅行
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）周四公布的第一季度亏损扩大，原因是在两国贸易关系紧张的情况下，其主要美国市场的客运量下降。【原文：Air Canada reported a wider first-quarter loss on Thursday, owing to weaker passenger traffic to its key U.S. market amid strained trade relations between the two countries.】

item.title: Celsius 创始人亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）因加密货币欺诈被判 12 年监禁
item.description: 破产加密货币贷款公司 Celsius Network 的创始人兼前首席执行官亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）在 12 月承认犯有证券欺诈和商品欺诈罪，周四被判处 12 年监禁。【原文：Alex Mashinsky, the founder and former chief executive of bankruptcy cryptocurrency lender Celsius Network, was sentenced on Thursday to 12 years in prison after pleading guilty in December to securities fraud and commodities fraud.】

item.title: 芭比娃娃制造商美泰聘请 Kenvue 的 Paul Ruh 担任首席财务官
item.description: 美泰周四任命消费保健巨头 Kenvue 的 Paul Ruh 为首席财务官，接替 Anthony DiSilvestro。【原文：Mattel on Thursday named consumer health giant Kenvue's Paul Ruh as CFO, replacing Anthony DiSilvestro.】

item.title: 独家报道卡夫亨氏要求咖啡供应商提前 60 天通知关税上调事宜
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份文件显示，销售美国顶级咖啡品牌麦斯威尔豪斯（Maxwell House）的食品制造商卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）已要求其咖啡供应商在因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税而涨价之前提前60天发出通知。【原文：Food maker Kraft Heinz , which sells top U.S. coffee brand Maxwell House, has asked its coffee suppliers for 60 days' notice before hiking prices due to U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 分析师称勒索软件组织 Lockbit 似乎遭到黑客攻击
item.description: 据勒索团伙 Lockbit 的一个网站上的一个恶意帖子和跟踪该团伙的安全分析师称，该团伙背后的勒索赎金网络罪犯似乎也遭遇了一次漏洞。【原文：The ransom-seeking cybercriminals behind the extortion group Lockbit appear to have suffered a breach of their own, according to a rogue post to one of the group's websites and security analysts who follow the gang.】

item.title: Coinbase 季度利润因支出增加而下降
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周四报告称，由于成本上升，第一季度利润下降。【原文：Crypto exchange Coinbase reported a drop in first-quarter profit on Thursday as costs rose.】

item.title: 美国旅游需求疲软，Expedia 季度收入不及预期；股价下跌
item.description: 在线旅游平台 Expedia 周四未能达到华尔街对该公司季度收入的预期，原因是美国的需求弱于预期，该行业正准备应对消费者支出放缓带来的业绩下滑。【原文：Online travel platform Expedia missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, due to weaker than expected demand in the U.S., as the industry braces for a slowdown amid slower consumer spending.】

item.title: 底特律三大汽车制造商抨击特朗普的英国贸易协议
item.description: 代表通用汽车、福特和斯泰伦特的一个团体抨击了唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布的与英国的贸易协议，称这将损害美国汽车行业。【原文：A group representing General Motors , Ford and Stellantis blasted President Donald Trump's trade deal announced with the United Kingdom, saying it would harm the U.S. auto sector.】

item.title: Pinterest 收入预测强劲，预示广告支出增长，股价大涨
item.description: 周四，Pinterest 预测本季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这表明尽管营销预算存在不确定性，但社交媒体平台上的广告支出仍在增长。【原文：Pinterest forecast current-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, a sign of growing advertising spend on the social media platform despite uncertainty over marketing budgets.】

item.title: 利润微薄，Citgo 第一季度亏损 8,200 万美元
item.description: 总部位于休斯顿的委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 周四表示，由于炼油利润疲软，该公司第一季度净亏损 8200 万美元，而去年同期净收入为 4.1 亿美元。【原文：Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum registered an $82 million net loss in the first quarter, compared with a net income of $410 million in the same period last year, amid weak refining margins, the Houston-based company said on Thursday.】

item.title: Lyft 加强股票回购计划，在增长放缓之际瞄准小型市场
item.description: Lyft 周四将股票回购计划增加到 7.5 亿美元，第一季度利润超出预期，表明对其叫车服务的需求稳定，股价在延时交易中上涨超过 6%。【原文：Lyft increased its stock buyback program to $750 million and beat first-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, signaling steady demand for its ride-hailing services, sending its shares up more than 6% in extended trading.】

item.title: 派拉蒙公司季度业绩因直接面向消费者的增长而超出预期
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周四公布的第一季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其直接面向消费者业务和电影娱乐业务的增长。【原文：Paramount Global beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, driven by a growth in its direct-to-consumer and filmed entertainment businesses.】

item.title: 稳定币法案未能在美国参议院通过关键障碍
item.description: 周四，为与美元挂钩的加密货币代币--稳定币--建立监管框架的立法面临挫折，因为该法案未能通过美国参议院的一个关键障碍。【原文：Legislation that would create a regulatory framework for U.S. dollar-pegged cryptocurrency tokens known as stablecoins faced a setback on Thursday as the bill failed to clear a key hurdle in the U.S. Senate.】

item.title: 纽约邮报》报道：美国正在权衡将对华关税降至 50%的计划
item.description: 纽约邮报》周四援引未透露姓名的消息来源报道称，特朗普政府正在权衡一项计划，最快将于下周把对中国进口商品征收的 145% 的关税削减一半以上。【原文：The Trump administration is weighing a plan to slash the 145% tariff on Chinese imports by more than half as soon as next week, the New York Post reported on Thursday, citing unidentified sources.】

item.title: 巴西牛肉游说团称，尽管新关税出台，巴西四月份对美牛肉出口仍大幅增长
item.description: 巴西牛肉游说团体Abiec负责人罗伯托-佩罗萨（Roberto Perosa）周四表示，尽管华盛顿执行了10%的新关税，巴西肉类出口商上个月仍向美国销售了约4.8万吨牛肉。【原文：Brazilian meat exporters sold some 48,000 metric tons of beef into the United States last month despite enforcement of a new 10% tariff by Washington, Roberto Perosa, head of Brazilian beef lobby Abiec, said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，英国国际航空集团将订购约 30 架空中客车喷气机
item.description: 业内消息人士周四称，英国航空公司（British Airways）的所有者IAG计划向空中客车公司订购约30架远程喷气式飞机，作为该欧洲飞机制造商与其美国竞争对手波音公司之间宽体飞机订单分成的一部分。【原文：British Airways owner IAG plans to place an order for around 30 long-haul jets from Airbus as part of a wide-body order split between the European planemaker and its U.S. rival Boeing , industry sources said on Thursday.】

item.title: 斯塔默称赞英国与特朗普达成关税协议后一周内取得的第二次贸易胜利
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）周四通过与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成协议，在三天内达成了第二份贸易协定，声称这是一场急需的政治胜利，消除了对英国一些必须脆弱的工业部门的威胁。【原文：British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Thursday secured a second trade pact in three days through a deal with U.S. President Donald Trump, claiming a much-needed political victory that removes a threat to some of the UK's must vulnerable industrial sectors.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，消费者监督机构叫停拜登时代的谷歌支付监管工作
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周四报道，美国消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）终止了对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌支付公司（Google Payment Corp）的指定监管令，推翻了拜登时代对这家非银行金融平台进行监管的决定。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau discontinued its order designating the supervision of Alphabet's Google Payment Corp, reversing a Biden-era decision to monitor the nonbank financial platform, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英国航空公司母公司 IAG 将向波音公司订购约 30 架喷气机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，英国航空公司母公司 IAG 准备订购约 30 架波音 787 Dreamliner 飞机。【原文：British Airways parent IAG is poised to order about 30 Boeing 787 Dreamliner aircraft, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司正在为智能眼镜和人工智能服务器开发专用芯片
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，苹果公司正在开发可为未来设备提供动力的专用芯片，包括首款智能眼镜、人工智能服务器和新款 MacBook。【原文：Apple is developing specialized chips that will power future devices including its first smart glasses, artificial intelligence servers and new MacBooks, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 花旗集团必须面对 10 亿美元的诉讼，诉讼称其协助墨西哥石油公司诈骗
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周四裁定，花旗集团必须重新面对一项诉讼，该诉讼声称花旗集团在现已破产的墨西哥石油和天然气服务公司 Oceanografia 精心策划并隐瞒了一起巨额欺诈案，造成了超过 10 亿美元的损失。【原文：Citigroup must face a revived lawsuit claiming it caused more than $1 billion of losses by orchestrating and concealing a vast fraud at the now-bankrupt Mexican oil and gas services company Oceanografia, a U.S. appeals court ruled on Thursday.】
